website_summaries.verdict: Simple, pretty light that fits into most decors. Does a good job of illumination, but brighter lights will be needed in larger rooms or kitchens.
pros: Wiring up is easy for even less-experienced do-it-yourselfers
Most had best results using it in entryways and foyers or as supplemental light in the kitchen
cons: Some blemishes in the glass canopy, and it sometimes mounts unevenly
Check the package on arrival for breakage or other issues, as return window is short

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, easy to install. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the light
customer_reviews.text: The light was extremely easy to install, looks great. We have already started our next project.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I installed it ourselves. The wires were not very long so it was tough. We are not professionals but managed to do it. Loved the price. I always appreciate pictures so thought I'd share mine. The third one it's in the background so you can see the whole light.
customer_reviews.author: Ya boi

customer_reviews.title: I like it. The shade has a few imperfections in ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The shade has a few imperfections in the glass so if you don't mind that then you'd probably give it 4 stars. For the price, it's a great portrayal for the higher end light fixtures you see in the fixer upper shows!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a simple, but great looking light to go over our dining table & this is the one! Super simple to install and can adjust the height rather easily as well. The one thing to note is bulb sold separately!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Simple, inexpensive and  nice pendant lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights were very inexpensive and I bought them as a go between while I looked for something else. It turns out that I like the nice clear illumination and they are working out quite well. Previously I had blingy, cut glass lights that threw shadows all over and it was difficult to see when I was preparing food or when the kids were doing homework etc. When one of those lights broke, I wasn’t sure what I wanted to replace it with. The previous lights were very expensive and only lasted a few years. These CLAXY lights are actually a very pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: My Jupiter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed- NOT as advertised- NOT seeded glass
customer_reviews.text: The product is advertised as seeded glass (ie: like bubble glass). It is NOT seeded glass. It’s a clear glass pendent. We did find two bubbles, lol- which, if not all over the glass are really just errors to a clear glass and can’t not seeded. I ordered this specifically wanting the all over/seeded glass. Other than this- it actually looks nice. We Ended up keeping it since it was the last part of our renovation and I didn’t want to deal with the hassle of a return and finding something else. But definitely not as advertised so be forewarned- rated two stars for false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these!! Easy to install. A very high end company (RH) sells some similar for about $150.00 more per light! We couldn't be more happy. The ONLY down side is - taking the globes off and washing them once a month, but so worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: booboo69

customer_reviews.title: IMPROPER PACKAGING
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for a Christmas gift and as we had an early gift opening gift together with the recipient, when it was finally opened up by the recipient, the clear globe was broken. We determined the cause was poor packaging for the glass globe and was trying to figure out how to get it replaced. Being purchased in October, the return window closed in November but we don't want to return the whole lamp fixture. We haven't figured out how to go about this dilemma for our gift recipient. Any ideas? TIA
customer_reviews.author: CJ White

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE BOOB LIGHTS!
customer_reviews.text: I am so very pleased with these lights!!! I have been looking for an alternative to contract lights in our house, the torturous "boob" lights. FINALLY I FOUND THESE! They can be adjusted short enough to be a close to ceiling fixture. They look find with regular lights too, though the Edison lights add a certain industrial look. I bought 4 and plan to buy more for the basement!
customer_reviews.author: s findley

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I received lots of compliments and when I tell them I got them on Amazon, they're surprised! They're especially shocked when I tell them how much I paid. You definitely can't beat the price! It's a simple design with a "WOW!" statement. I definitely recommend these pendants!
customer_reviews.author: KMags

customer_reviews.title: These are a great value. I have these in the center of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value. I have these in the center of my kitchen over a small island. The clear shade allows for good ambient light and you can adjust the height. I personally love how it's simple, hung with wire vs metal rod and has a clean and classic look. Great size too. The choice of bulb really determines the light you'll have since the shade is so open and the bulb is so exposed...I recommend Hyperikon 5W Dimmable ST64 LED Vintage Filament Bulb, 500 lumen, 3000K, E26 Base, UL, Pack of 6 on amazon if you want a whiter edison style light.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Really Bright
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of these pendant lights, and that's why I bought them. They are exactly as described, and they are very modern looking in my new kitchen design. Love them. The only thing I didn't like is the clear shades can almost blind you. I had to buy some window frosting paint to paint them so the light wasn't so intense from my kitchen. However, I knew they were clear when I bought them, so it's nobody's fault but my own. Just beware—if you've never used a clear shade, it can temporarily blind you if it's hanging over your bar or anywhere else that's a low area.
customer_reviews.author: C Huff

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy enough, given the weight of the glass shade
customer_reviews.text: overall, both my hubs and I hated how this looked (which is saying something b/c we rarely agree on style). The glass shade is THICK and heavy, which left me VERY nervous about how little space the attaching ring had to screw onto. I trust my install on the wiring end, but I couldn't get comfortable with how the shade attached to the head portion. It's over a dining table where my littles eat... if it comes loose, we have crashing glass and potentially devastating injury. No thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy install and looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the fixture in the kitchen over the dining table with this and it was easy to install. Took two people with no electrical experience or knowledge at all about 30 minutes total to cut the wires to the right size and get it placed. Looks lovely paired with an Edison bulb!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Potts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mix of Simplicity and Rustic
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture has a simple rustic look that I was looking for our lodge cabin style. It was very easy to install. I didn’t come with a light bulb but that’s ok because I was able to buy an Edison style light bulb that complements the look perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Needed a light for a little alcove in a back bedroom so didn’t want to spend a lot on it. I love this light!! Looks so good for the money. The instructions are not extensive but having put up a lot of lights before it was not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - Buy These Lights!
customer_reviews.text: We bought three (3) pendant lights and the recommended light bulbs. We couldn't be happier with the quality and the super fast shipping. We shopped around and these were actually nicer than the ones we saw in a few of the Knoxville, TN local lighting stores that were well over $100.00. We did end up buying the extra conversion kit to make the installation easier to convert our canned/recessed lights, but it was still a great deal, especially since the kit allowed screw in installation. Search no further if you want quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Light Over My Kitchen Sink
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light to go over my sink and complement the other Claxy pendant chandelier I have over my dining table:  These light fixtures together were a quick and simple way to update my 2002 kitchen. I love them! For this light in particular, quality is excellent and installation was easy. We replaced an existing fixture, so it only took my husband about 15 minutes. We have an LED Edison-style bulb which completes the look. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Craftsmanship -  Just industrial enough to
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I aren't into chandeliers, so we went the pendant-route. The quality of the glass is good - but it isn't imperfection-free.The craftsmanship of the fixture is excellent, the bronze finish is very nice to look at. Please note that I tied a knot in the cord so that we can (eventually) hang it from a hook to orientate it to the center of our dining table. It's well worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Danimal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, BUT!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lights, the only problem. Is the glass lamp shards balance and quality is subpar. We have spent several hours and days trying to get the lights to not hang crooked. Both lights are hanging with a tilt and anything we try doesn’t help. The company needs to make sure the glass shades are same weight and balanced before offering to customers.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Frantom

customer_reviews.title: We love it. The light bulb has to be purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive. One of the reviewers said it was plastic. It's not plastic, it's glass. We love it. The light bulb has to be purchased separately. It works with our dimmer switch on the wall, too.
customer_reviews.author: Don and Debbi Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new breakfast room light. It’s just the right size and color for the space and give off plenty of light over the table. The install was done by the guys working doing updating on the house but they didn’t have any problems and were all done in under 10 minutes. I will definitely be buying more product from this seller when we’re done updating our island lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Lany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lights
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights! They're plastic, not glass, so they're lightweight. Easy to clean. Very pretty and luminescent with 40w daylight bulbs in each chandelier. Purchased 3 and had them professionally installed. The process looked easy for the electrician. It's been almost 1 year since they've been installed. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this light. It fit right in and updated our dining area beautifully. I wish I could find a smaller ceiling light similar to it. I installed it with a friend. The only issue I ran into was the mounting bold were too short because we had just had our ceilings overlayed to get rid of popcorn. I at least had the presence of mind to bring the nut with me and look for metric bolts. Once that situation was solved, we had it up in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Debby McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights so much! They were perfect for our kitchen remodel. We have two hanging over our island and one over our sink. You must use edison light bulbs though, they look a little strange with regular bulbs in them. The only downside is they get dusty very easily, but you just have to stay on top of your dusting (they look extra dusty in the pictures- because this was right after the contractors finished in the kitchen).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Haley

customer_reviews.title: Better than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that it would look "cheap" since some people had posted that in their reviews, and the price was only $40. I love it. I went with a enlarged amber round globe bulb, which really sets it off. the contrast of clear glass and amber"ish" bulb is perfect. Spiffied up my entry just like i hoped.
customer_reviews.author: sarry abfalter

customer_reviews.title: Good light, but inconsistent glass.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the light is nice and made of quality materials. However, one of the two lights I ordered does not hang level. I have had them hanging for several weeks and there has been no improvement. This is due to a defect in the glass sconce making it heavier on one side. I have rotated the sconce, in relation to the socket, and the angle of the sconce follows. Hopefully I can contact the seller to get a replacement. UPDATE: Seller quickly shipped me new light free of charge and also let me keep the original one. New light hangs perfectly level.
customer_reviews.author: Steph and Tim Gwinn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my entryway
customer_reviews.text: Received today (prime) and was blown away with the quality of the packaging I have read some reviews saying how cheap it looked and How thin the glass was. I found the Opposite to be true. The globe is thick and well made. It looks very much like any pendant light costing $200 or more. It took about 15 minutes to cut the cable to my length and install. The overwhelming reason For the ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ is my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: donald williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Light Fixture!
customer_reviews.text: Okay— where to begin. I am in love with this light fixture. It was exactly what I was looking for, for half the price compared to Home Depot/Lowe’s . It arrived carefully packaged and I received the item in perfect condition. I had no issue with installing it in my kitchen. The length of the fixture is adjustable!!! It also came with all the hardware (minus tools of course). I was able to shorten the cord so that it could fit nicely above my kitchen sink! I am very happy with my purchase and would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: ally_cat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: This light is exactly what we were looking for. The fixture is minimalistic and let’s you appreciate the Edison bulb. Because the glass is not frosted it adds light to the entire space, instead of just focused in one stop. The cord allows for a lot of adjustment and installation took about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lights - love the look and hardware color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lights! Bowls aren't perfectly round and so at some angles they look slightly lopsided. Comes with everything you need to install.
customer_reviews.author: xc mtb

customer_reviews.title: Great pendant lamps
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these look fantastic and are a great value given the price. There are some minor imperfections with bubbles in the glass. You can see these up close but realistically are not noticeable when hung up. These were a bit of a pain for us to install ourselves as the brackets included didn't work well with our ceiling boxes - it didn't fit. It took a little bit of troubleshooting, but we ended up using our old brackets with the lights and it fit that way. They look really great and gave our kitchen a more updated look (we hung up 3 over our island).
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing for the value.
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing for the value. This was as easy an installation as I expected. It looks like a $120 fixture. I recommend a 60w Edison bulb though as a single bulb needs to be brighter than the 30/40w. I started with. Also, put it on a dimmer and your golden.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Y

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights!! We replaced 2 five bulb chandeliers with these lights and we absolutely love them!! The price was great for the product we received. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: sweetT

customer_reviews.title: Now this is how customer service should be done.
customer_reviews.text: First light I received hung crooked. Figured you get what you pay for and left a 1 Star review. Ecopower Lighting then made a heroic effort to turn the situation around. They sent an email apologizing for the flaw and sent me a replacement unit. Then followed up to make certain I was happy. I'm pleased with the product and impressed by Ecopower Lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Chester J Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Love it - looks like a million bucks
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. It looks like a high-end lamp, perfect for our farmhouse/industrial kitchen. The two-toned metal finish is beautiful. We have it over our sink with a clear, 'squirrel cage' Edison bulb. Looks like a million bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jett747

customer_reviews.title: How do you feel about staring into a light bulb ?
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I feel like I'm being interrogated at the dinner table but, it shows every bit of dust. Extremely difficult to keep it clean, even with an extension duster. I'm replacing it with a fixture has the bulbs covered and facing up. Same price on Amazon. Think twice about this one.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fixtures
customer_reviews.text: These pendants are gorgeous! My husband is no electrician or handyman, but was able to easily install 3 of them above our kitchen island. They do not come with lightbulbs, but I recommend getting the Hudson Vintage Antique looking lightbulbs. It gives a warm feeling to the room and they pair perfectly together. I'm going to check what other light fixtures Ecopower Lighting offers to match other rooms around my house, because it really made a huge difference in our kitchen. My house feels more luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Advice
customer_reviews.text: Lights are nice and look good. They are a little tricky to install. We were able to look up the wiring translation which helped with the three clear wires. Before cutting the wire, be sure you spread the individual wires so you don’t lose your L N and E markings.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two for over new kitchen island, with the matching three light chandelier for new dining room and four smaller pendants for over bar. Previous reviews of uneven glass are true. We have one that has a groove along the bottom with a black mark in the glass. The electrician hung them and one looked crooked but within a few weeks gravity straightened it out. Great price but you get what you're paying for at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thax

customer_reviews.title: NICE look for our new office kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I simply liked these fixtures - bought 5 and they were installed in our new office kitchen - did not use edison bulbs but used "warm" LED lamps - very satisfied - now that said, I'm referring to "look" - I didn't have to mount them - the electricians did the mounting, so I can't tell you much else besides how they looked (which is subjective)
customer_reviews.author: Evans

customer_reviews.title: Badly scratched glass dome from the factory ?
customer_reviews.text: The lamp's glass dome had scratches from the factory, lots of them, Almost looked like it had been sand blasted, that bad ! At first I thought it may have been dust, then when it would not wash off, I returned the item as defective. Other than that the rest of the lamp looked quality, well packaged, it would have received a 5 star rating from me
customer_reviews.author: forbiddenapple

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: We like the look of this light. More importantly, this is a well-constructed unit. The metal parts are all very precise, and threaded parts are nicely machined, and hold the glass in place very securely. It is easy to adjust the length of the cord and, overall, very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this light! I bought it to replace another pendant fixture over my dining room table. I was a tad concerned it would be too small, but it looks great. Super easy to install. I did it myself in less than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: AsMeow

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this! The quality and design is so poor it couldn't be installed to hang straight. The globe flange was deformed, and the cord bent, so nothing the professional installer did made any difference. The installer was my contractor who still needed to be paid, so now I lost the money I had to pay him! Also, the company had no customer service phone number. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Blood

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was impressed with the quality. Everything lines up well. The glass has a few random air bubbles, hense the 4-star. We had one glass that was misshapen and hung uneven. I contacted the seller, sent them pictures, and they sent me a new shade in the same week. I Highly recommend these lights!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob U.

customer_reviews.title: A steal for the money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple but elegant light and saw this and for the price I figured it was worth a shot. I literally put it up today and everyone who has seen it wants one. And at the price it is a great buy. It really is nice and looks way more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Slakkie

customer_reviews.title: Too Bright For Me
customer_reviews.text: The fixture is very attractive but the clear shade made it hard on the eyes for me. If you are looking for a "bright" light this would be a good option for you.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Yasumura

customer_reviews.title: More nicer than how it looks on pics!
customer_reviews.text: Pictures don’t capture the beauty of this lamp, I didn’t think I was going to like it so much, I got it because of the price. I needed for a little space or room under the stairs, wanted to add a detail that would make the area look less like under the stairs 😜 and this lamp did just that. It arrive in perfect conditions. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Neris

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Really expected this to have some cheap bits given the price, but it doesn't. The hardware all looks good. One small bubble in the glass but I think that just adds character. Remember to buy your own vintage bulbs for this.
customer_reviews.author: wadie

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice, I get loads of compliments on it. I did not put the old style Edison bulb in, I used a frosted LED round bulb (like a vanity bulb) It casts the most beautiful rings of light on the ceiling when it is on.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fixture that cost a fraction of the price similar to ones from large interior design stores. No problem putting it up. We used a different light bulb than an Edison bulb that worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Womack

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Lamp was very easy to assemble. The height is easily adjustable. I love the look of the look of edison bulbs in light fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Amy reviews it all

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lights are beautiful and reasonably priced! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check for actually working before installing
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with looks of product until turning on and found there was a bad inner wire connection keeping the light from operating. Had to pay extra for installer to disassemble and repair inside the socket housing.
customer_reviews.author: wayne m

customer_reviews.title: Crisp clean modern shade.
customer_reviews.text: Look beautiful over our long kitchen island. They throw a good light and were incredible value for money. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Blader

customer_reviews.title: I really like this light but the cord never seemed to great ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this light but the cord never seemed to great straight even after a year of it hanging. If that doesn't bother you or you want to weave it through chain than it would probably work better for you but it bothered us too much and we ended up getting a different light.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: It looked ok at first
customer_reviews.text: Ok the price is low but unfortunately it hung poorly , We could not get it to hang straight. The glass showed so many fingerprints on it. Then I felt it looked cheap! I had to pay someone to install it. If you don't mind fingerprints showing this is for you!!
customer_reviews.author: brian p nolte

customer_reviews.title: Clean retro Perfect Look for kitchen light replacement
customer_reviews.text: Replaced ugly plastic lights with these in the kitchen in a log house. They look great and provide just the right amount of Down vs up Lite. I am now looking for the perfect vintage LED filament bulb. Very happy with the purchase. I thought I might have to spray paint the lighter brass part but it actually looks really good with a darker brown part.
customer_reviews.author: snoWYmonkey

customer_reviews.title: People love these lights over our 8ft island
customer_reviews.text: People love these lights over our 8ft island! they are beautiful. Only issue at all is that the chords still aren't hanging straight after a couple months now. so, if you're super duper OCD about every one of them hanging perfectly, then that could be an issue for you. Other than that, they look and perform amazingly! :)
customer_reviews.author: Hogan M.

customer_reviews.title: It's not a bad light in itself
customer_reviews.text: I was a little taken aback by how small this light is. Our kitchen isn't huge, but this light looks comical hanging above our kitchen table. It's not a bad light in itself, just make sure you are aware that it is pint size and....charming....
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Awad

customer_reviews.title: The light fixture really makes my small laundry room look great!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful added touch to my small laundry room. It goes so we'll with the wall paper I added to the one wall, the light fixture just the room to a whole new level. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sportangelv

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and gain lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I get endless compliments on these, and compared to prices for turn-of-the-century/early mid-century style pendant lamps I was seeing on specialty sites, you can't beat the price on these. The cord is adjustable, so you can have them at whatever length suits your kitchen/room and your own height. Everyone loves the Edison bulbs and they give off a gorgeous light. Of course, having glass fixtures, you see the dust the second it forms, so be prepared to clean them frequently, but they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Adina S

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: we made alterations to the cable the light hangs from so I could not send them back per purchase agreement. Sadly one of the 2 was warped and hangs crooked. VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: linda b.

customer_reviews.title: Returned. Not seeded glass.
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Not seeded glass. Really loved the shape and such but when rcvd was not seeded glass. Was plan glass and did not match our hall lights that we installed. Returned and purchased other light.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy SG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought a hanging light fixture to change an existing bathroom light that was made of plastic. Because I have the slanted ceilings, I researched and found that this would be the perfect option. It came with a longer cord but was easy to make short by pulling it through. It was easy to install and beautiful looking after
customer_reviews.author: Tammy h

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I’m putting my home on the market and I’m taking the kitchen light with me. I bought this to replace the one I’m taking. This is really good looking!
customer_reviews.author: Choir Momma

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, the light fixture! We even bought the 3 light pendant fixture for the island. Still under construction and cannot not wait to see it all together with the cabinets and island!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap quality. Glass looks recycled and cloudy. Overall, it looks very cheap. Don't waste your money. Unless you want a hospital or Dentist vibe. Ugly and cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Miss J.

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and solid
customer_reviews.text: This fixture is easy to install and has classic style. The metal parts are nicely thick, solid, and heavy, not the crappy sheet metal like I've seen on other lamps. It was a piece of cake to install — it took me less than 10 minutes to replace a boring, builder-grade flush mount ceiling fixture with this handsome pendant.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Rhorer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, very nice for the money. If you're on the fence, pull the trigger. Note: there's a collar that needs to be unthreaded and then the glass lamp placed onto housing. Then re-apply the metal collar to secure. If you're looking for that missing piece it's because it's already threaded on.
customer_reviews.author: HippoSl33k

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light, exactly what I was looking for. There was an imperfection in the first glass shade sent, the seller sent out a new light extremely fast and without issue. Fits over our sink great and matches our decor preference.
customer_reviews.author: MSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great looking light
customer_reviews.text: This light is great. Matches my pendant lights I bought earlier this year. A little tricky to install unless you are aware of wires being labeled L, N and a symbol. But simple Google search and you are in business.
customer_reviews.author: GMCUSMC

customer_reviews.title: Thought this was a plug in...my mistake
customer_reviews.text: I don't like to mess with electrical work. Thought this was a plug-in...must red more thoroughly next time
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Adds Character for Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, did it by myself in about 30 minutes.
